text:
mayi# vOq rAya#H SrayantAM ||
tathsa#viqturvarE$NyaqM BargO# dEqvasya# dhImahi | dhiyOq yOna#H pracOqdayA$t ||
sOqmAnaq(gg)q svara#NaM kRuNuqhi bra#hmaNaspatE | kaqkShIva#ntaqM ~Mya au#SiqjaM ||
kaqdA caqna staqrIra#siq nEndra# saScasi dAqSuShE$ |
upOqpEnnu ma#GavaqnBUyaq innu tEq dAna#M dEqvasya# pRucyatE ||
pari# tvA&gnEq pura#M ~MvaqyaM ~Mvipra(gm)# sahasya dhImahi |
dhRuqShadva#rNaM ( ) diqvEdi#vE BEqttAra#M Ba~gguqrAva#taH ||
agnE# gRuhapatE sugRuhapaqtiraqhaM tvayA# gRuqhapa#tinA BUyAsa(gm) sugRuhapaqtirmayAq tvaM gRuqhapa#tinA BUyAH Saqta(gm) himAqstAmAqSiShaqmA SA#sEq tanta#vEq jyOti#ShmatIqM tAmAqSiShaqmA SA#sEq &muShmaiq jyOti#ShmatIM || 24
(BUqyAqstaq-svaqstayE&gnE#-puShyAsaM-dhRuqShadva#rNaq-mEkAqnna triq(gm)qSacca#) (A6)
